description:
This course is all about management consulting.

Whether you are a business student considering a career with a major consulting firm, a professional considering freelance consulting work, or simply someone interested in management, business analysis, and how organisations can run better, this course is for you.

The course covers basics of business analysis, management, leadership, and corporate strategy, as well as more specialised aspects of consulting, including behavioural economics and complexity management. You can begin at the beginning, or dive in wherever suits you best.

Later sections of the course feature content on getting started as a freelance management consultant, growing a profitable consulting practice, and how to successfully apply to work at an existing management consulting firm.

The course is regularly updated with new content, making this a real lifetime investment into your education and career. Ready to begin? Let's get started!
title: Learn Management Consulting
